thread.title: Small room, for small budget, big quality!
thread.title_full: Small room, for small budget, big quality! - Review of Ibis Paris Gare de Lyon Reuilly, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TheLadiByrd
title: Small room, for small budget, big quality!
text:
I wrote very early because I had an early morning flight. Early check-in which they were able to do for me. :-)
Online I booked two single beds but the room that they gave me was one double bed. Since I did early check in I didn't want to complain but definitely need it two separate beds so I call downstairs and see if they had two singles available since that's what I registered for, they were easily able to make the change for me. Very accommodating.
Although small, the rooms are very clean and doable for two people without lots of baggage or a parent and one child. Walls are thin, you can hear everything!
They have free Internet. They offer 80+ version of that for 299. We also have breakfast, which I did not get so I can't tell you anything about it.
Overall I really like the place! Definitely would recommend it for travel on a budget.
